subject: Dear  xxx ,
body:
Dear  xxx ,
Thanks for your email, kindly proceed with the below account and make
sure you complete the payment and send me the transfer confirmation copy
once it is done.
$585
Bank details:
Receiver : M. R.
IBAN: LT84 3250 0040 06xx xxxx
BIC: REVOLT21B
bank Name Revolt
Address: xxx 7655 Verdal Norway
Bank Address WESTFERRY CIRCUS, 7 THE COLUMBUS BUILDING FLOOR 4, LONDON.
Send me the bank transfer confirmation copy, it is very important.

subject: Re: Dear  xxx ,
body:
Dear xxx,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. However, before proceeding with the payment, I have a few questions regarding the transaction.

1. Could you please provide me with more details about the purpose of this payment? It would be helpful to understand why it is important and how it will benefit both parties involved.

2. Can you confirm if Revolt Bank is a well-established and reputable financial institution? I want to ensure that my funds are being transferred through a secure and reliable channel.

3. Is there any specific deadline or timeline for completing the payment? It would be useful for me to know so that I can plan accordingly.

I look forward to your response and further clarification on these matters. Thank you again for your cooperation.

Best wishes,
Stella

subject: Re: Dear xxx ,
body:
Dear

Many thanks for the quick response. As you already know, you need to
contact the processing bank and request details about receiving your
payment. Also, note that you only have to pay the Notarization fee of $585
to complete the transfer process. Make no mistake, you can find the bank's
contact details below.

Contact the processing bank at the email below for quick and further action:
info.ubs@ubswiss.com
Bank: UBS Bank

Contact them now and make sure you get back to me for more directives to
follow, you need to be guided.


Sincerely yours,
Mr. Ben Swanson, Assistant Secretary-General
The United Nations Office of Internal Oversight Services
United Nations Headquarters, New York City
Responsible for Internal Audits, Investigations, and Program Evaluation ,

subject: Re: Dear xxx ,
body:
Dear Mr. Ben Swanson,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding contacting the processing bank to receive my payment. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding.

1. Could you please provide me with more details about the fee that needs to be paid? What is it for and how can I ensure its legitimacy?

2. Can you confirm if the contact details you mentioned are for the official bank associated with the United Nations? I want to make sure I am reaching out to the correct institution.

3. Are there any specific instructions or documents that I need to prepare before contacting the bank? It would be helpful to know what information they might require from me.

I look forward to your guidance on these matters so that I can proceed accordingly.

Best wishes,
Stella

subject: Re: Dear xxx ,
body:

subject: Re: Dear xxx ,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message and the information you have provided. It sounds like there is a fee document required by the bank to register my name and complete the transfer of funds. Could you please provide more details about this fee document? What is it for exactly?

I am interested in receiving the funds, but I would like to understand the process better before proceeding. Can you explain how contacting the bank will help me receive the funds? Are there any specific instructions or documents that I need to provide to them?

I look forward to your response and further guidance.

Best wishes,
Stella

subject: Re: Dear xxx ,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message and the information you have provided. It sounds like there is a process in place to transfer funds to me, which is interesting.

Could you please provide more details about the fee document that needs to be paid to the bank? What is the purpose of this fee? How much is it? And how can I be sure that once I pay this fee, the transfer will be completed successfully?

I look forward to hearing back from you with more information.

Best wishes,
Stella

subject: Re: Dear xxx ,
body:

payment successful without any problem kindly go ahead and make the payment

And also the reason why you are paying for the fee is for the approval
document and for the ownership document in your name so that you have the

 waiting for your urgent response so that I can send you the payment

Sincerely yours,
Mr. Ben Swanson, Assistant Secretary-General

body:

subject: Re: Dear xxx ,
body:

subject: Re: Dear xxx ,
body:

Best wishes,
Stella
